text: Kang Hye-ja (born 4 July 1966) is a South Korean sport shooter. She was born in Jeju Province. She won a gold medal in the women's 10 metre air rifle team event in shooting at the 1986 Asian Games along with teammates Lee Hong-ki (이홍기; 李弘基) and Park Jeong-ah (박정아; 朴貞娥). She later competed in the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean female sport shooters Category:ISSF rifle shooters Category:Olympic shooters of South Korea Category:Shooters at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Sportspeople from Jeju Province Category:Asian Games gold medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Kang Hye-ja
